original_text: You say that you have good plans. You say that your army is strong. But those are only useless words! You have turned against me, so who are you trusting to save you?
korean_text: 내가 말하노니 네가 족히 싸울 계략과 용맹이 있노라 함은 입술에 붙은 말뿐이니라 네가 이제 누구를 믿고 나를 반역하느냐

sentences.original_text: You say that you have good plans.
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 좋은 계획을 가지고 있다고 말한다.

sentences.original_text: You say that your army is strong.
But those are only useless words!
so who are you trusting to save you?
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 누구를 믿고 너를 구원받으려 하는가?
